title: GET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO
content:
0x82E794B7// GetVehicleGearRatio
float GET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO(Vehicle vehicle, int gear);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.gear: The vehicles gear you want to get.Gets vehicles gear ratio on choosen gear.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(-1))
local currentGear = GetVehicleCurrentGear(Vehicle)

print(GetVehicleGearRatio(vehicle, currentGear)) -- will print current vehicle gear to console
codeBlocks:
// GetVehicleGearRatio
float GET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO(Vehicle vehicle, int gear);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(-1))
local currentGear = GetVehicleCurrentGear(Vehicle)

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_GEAR_RATIO
GetVehicleGearRatio(vehicle, 0)
